page.title: 07Chickerell
page.content: I live in{Chickerell}which is{3 miles away from the{seaside resort of {Weymouth}and{6 miles away}from {Dorchester. The village shops are very nice.The {Post Office}sells hardware as well as papers and stamps.There is a{poultry {farm}and a{slaughter house}which sells fresh meat. There is a{Water Lily Farm}which sells water plants,water weed and fish and it is very unusual.The{toad {crossing in Putton Lane}is one of the things that happen in{Spring.}This is when the toads go across Putton Lane to the Water Lily Farm. Many boys go to the{playing field which is a field which has a stretch of grass and part of it is a playground. The{Youth Club}is for older boys.-Daniel and David Poet.
